tool_description: We are focused on delivering data from major news websites in Indonesia.
name: Indonesia News

api_list.name: vivanews-detail
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://indonesia-news.p.rapidapi.com/detail/vivanews/1612364"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indonesia-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indonesia-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
